sect1.title: Probe configuration
sect1.para: Each probe first reads the general configuration file /etc/upwatch.conf and then its own configurationfile in /etc/upwatch.d if it exists. Normally some general things like the debug and logging level, and the database access are specified in the first file, and any probe-specific setting in the second file. You can also override settings from the generic file in the probe-specific file.
Each program has a manual page that documents options. Every long commandine option can also be entered in a configuration file.
